title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; npm-installable.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use Ollama models as LLM/Chat/Embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, file import, RAG, admin panel).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-cli (ggozad/ollama-cli)
summary: Rust-based TUI for chatting with Ollama models, featuring themes & keybindings.

title: ollama-copilot (cmiscm/ollama-copilot)
summary: VS Code extension turning Ollama models into inline coding copilots.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET client for Ollama with async streaming.

title: ollama-gui (jtackaberry/ollama-gui)
summary: Lightweight Python/TKinter desktop GUI for chatting with Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-rag (vanurag/ollama-rag)
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama responses into Discord threads.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: Official n8n node to call Ollama models inside automation workflows.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama functions to MCP clients.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that need to spin up Ollama containers.

title: ollama-rust (paragor/ollama-rust)
summary: Async Rust crate wrapping Ollama REST API with Tokio/hyper.

title: ollama-go (michael-adler/ollama-go)
summary: Simple Go client for Ollama with context-aware chat helpers.
